page.title: 17MEDIA IN HULCOTE & SALFORD
page.content: The public have access to a variety of media sources, television being one of the prime forms. Four tv channels are available, two of which are broadcast by the BBC. The local independent tv company is Anglia Television based in Norwich.Television programmes are often recorded on VCR's for later viewing. Four channels of national radio broadcasting are supplemented by local programming from Chiltern Radio, the local ILR station and by Radio Bedford. National and daily newspapers and magazines are delivered to the villages as well as the locally printed Bedfordshire Times. A free weekly newspaper financed from advertising revenue, "the Citizen" is also available, although its primary circulation area is the new city of Milton Keynes nearby.
